title: Update product catalog with exact product names, descriptions, and prices

requirements.summary: Update frontend ProductCatalog and ProductCard components to display the new exact product data with full descriptions, exact prices, and appropriate emoji fallbacks for all 9 products including the new serum type
acceptanceCriteria: 'For Babies' tab displays exactly 4 product cards with correct names, full descriptions, and prices.
'For Adults' tab displays exactly 5 product cards including RenewGlow Serum at $22.
Each card shows the exact single price (not a range) matching the backend data.
Full product description text is rendered on each card.
The serum product card renders correctly in the adult grid without layout breakage.
Emoji fallback icons are contextually appropriate per product type.
